    publications

    Light Sterile Neutrinos at nuSTORM: Decoherence and CP violation

    "Light Sterile Neutrinos at nuSTORM: Decoherence and CP violation", Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, arXiv preprint, 2017,

    Neutrino trident scattering at near detectors

    "Neutrino trident scattering at near detectors", Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Yuber Perez-Gonzalez, Zahra Tabrizi, Renata Funchal, Journal of High Energy Physics, 2019,

    Z-primes in neutrino scattering at DUNE

    "Z-primes in neutrino scattering at DUNE", Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Yuber Perez-Gonzalez, Zahra Tabrizi, Renata Zukanovich, Phys. Rev. D, 2019,

    Neutrino masses from a dark neutrino sector below the electroweak scale

    "Neutrino masses from a dark neutrino sector below the electroweak scale", Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, PRD, 2019,

    Neutrino Non-Standard Interactions: A Status Report

    "Neutrino Non-Standard Interactions: A Status Report",P. Bhupal Dev and others, arXiv preprint, 2019,

    Testing New Physics Explanations of the MiniBooNE Anomaly at Neutrino Scattering Experiments

    "Testing New Physics Explanations of the MiniBooNE Anomaly at Neutrino Scattering Experiments", Carlos Arguelles, Matheus Hostert, Yu-Dai Tsai, PRL, 2019,

    Dark neutrinos and a three-portal connection to the standard model

    "Dark neutrinos and a three-portal connection to the standard model", Peter Ballett, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, PRD, 2020,

    Constraints on Decaying Sterile Neutrinos from Solar Antineutrinos

    "Constraints on Decaying Sterile Neutrinos from Solar Antineutrinos", Matheus Hostert, Maxim Pospelov, arXiv preprint, 2020,

    Pair production of dark particles in meson decays

    "Pair production of dark particles in meson decays", Matheus Hostert, Kunio Kaneta, Maxim Pospelov, PRD, 2020,

    New opportunities at the next-generation neutrino experiments I: BSM neutrino physics and dark matter

    "New opportunities at the next-generation neutrino experiments I: BSM neutrino physics and dark matter",C. Arguelles and others, Reports on Progress in Physics, 2020,

    Novel multi-lepton signatures of dark sectors in light meson decays

    "Novel multi-lepton signatures of dark sectors in light meson decays", Matheus Hostert, Maxim Pospelov, arXiv preprint, 2020,

    A dark seesaw solution to low energy anomalies: MiniBooNE, the muon (g ensuremath- 2), and BaBar

    "A dark seesaw solution to low energy anomalies: MiniBooNE, the muon (g ensuremath- 2), and BaBar", Asli Abdullahi, Matheus Hostert, Silvia Pascoli, Phys. Lett. B, 2021,
